narrative.narrative: BQB Lineas Aereas is based at Montevideo,Uruguay and was founded in 2010. Its first routes were between Montevideo and Salto which it does twice a weel and between Montevideo and Rivera three times a week, both routes are domestic. As of November 2014 it no longer does those flights, but now it does a domestic flight to Punta del Este. International destinations are Asuncion,Paraguay, Buenos Aires,Argentina, and Florianopolis,Brazil which is done seasonally. For a time it served the Brazilian cities of Sao Paulo,Rio de Janeiro,Porto Alegre,Foz do Iguacu and Curitiba. In January 2015 it had four ATR 72-500's, it had 2 at the start in 2010. It had one A319 in storage. It leased an A320 from November 2013 to April 2014.
